details.message:
`001.007.001 Active_Workflow`
- Test generates a Workflow - "SMCT Workflow".
- Linked together with workstages "Stage A-C" and "SMCT Workflow Form".
- To create workflow forms, see `001.007.002` 
- To create/configure workstages, see `001.007.003` and `001.008.001`.
- To configure triggers, see `001.007.004`.
- To configure formulas, see `001.007.005`.
details.name: 001.007.001 Active_Workflow
